title: Do You Lead with a Scarcity Mentality?
description:
What if our volunteers find somewhere better to serve? Are we offering them enough opportunities? Why does it seem like they are just not interested anymore? A scarcity mentality can get your church stuck.

Everyone is competing for people's time. Instead of only focusing on how volunteers can fill spots in your church, what would happen if you empowered them to impact the world with their gifts and abilities everyday?
content:encoded:

itunes:subtitle: Holding Volunteers Too Tightly Can Stunt the Right Kind of Growth
